content.name: area1
content.content:
Reorder Your Checks Online

When it’s time to reorder checks for your business, you can do so from the convenience of ordering online from T8 Checks, our check provider’s website. With only a few clicks you can reorder your checks and have them delivered straight to your front door.

Reorder Checks from T8 Checks

Please note that this site is for check reorders only. If you have not previously ordered checks through our vendor, T8 Checks, you will receive an error message when using the site. If you receive this error message, please contact us or visit your location branch and we can order the checks for you.

content.name: area1
content.content:
With e-Switch, we’ll transfer your bank account from another financial institution including all the pre-authorized debits and credits to an existing or new account at Banksite. With e-Switch, you give us the approval, and we’ll take care of the rest.

Simply provide us with your authorization and we will:

  • Coordinate the transfer of automatic banking transactions, such as pre-authorized payments an direct deposits
  • Coordinate the transfer of your account balance
  • Send you written confirmation of when those automatic banking transactions will be switched over
  • Arrange for your old account to be closed

Here’s how e-Switch works:

  • Complete an e-Switch Authorization form
  • A Banksite e-Switch Manager will call you at a date and time that is convenient for you to answer any questions you may have
  • You will receive a Payment Change Schedule by mail showing when the payments will be made to your Banksite account.

That’s it. There’s not much to it and we make it extremely easy to switch right here, right now.

content.name: area1
content.content:
Show your Panther Pride

University of Northern Iowa Athletics and Banksite have joined forces to offer an exclusive Panther Pride Free Checking account. In exchange for the rights to promote Panther Pride Checking through various school and athletic venues, Banksite is giving back a percentage of the revenue generated from Panther Pride checking accounts to the University of Northern Iowa athletic program. The account is free and available to students, parents, faculty and staff, alumni and any other Panther fans who want to show their Panther pride. The account includes a Panther branded debit card and checks, as well as a number of additional perks.

“We are extremely excited to be partnering with Banksite to offer this unique program,” said Trent Reznor, University of Northern Iowa athletic director. “Not only is this an extremely cool way for Panther fans to show their school pride, but it’s also the easiest way for them to support our athletic programs at no additional cost to them.”
  • Minimum balance to open is $20
  • Free monthly statements
  • Free online banking and Bill Pay
  • Choose from four different custom Panther Pride debit cards, checks and checkbook covers

Panther Pride Free Checking will officially next Thursday at the UNI men’s basketball game against Southern Illinois. Banksite will be on hand to discuss account details as well as to open accounts. The school’s goal is to open 1000 new Panther Pride Free Checking accounts over the course of 2012 in order to fund designated programs.

“Banksite is always looking for new and creative ways to cultivate deeper relationships with our customers, create opportunities to gain new customers and give back to the communities we serve,” said Bryan Sadler, Vice President of Marketing for Banksite. “Because of our focus on education and the partnership we already had with UNI, the Panther Pride Checking and give-back program gave us a way to accomplish all of these great goals.”

If you would like to learn how you can customize your own debit card with your own personal photos, visit our card customization page.

content.name: area2
content.content:
Community Service Award

Twice a year, Banksite honors individuals that give back to our communities. These individuals help make our community a better place to live, work and play. These are the individuals that give their time, their energy and their money. Most importantly though, they give their heart by showing compassion throughout everything they do.

If you have someone in mind and would like to nominate them for a Community Service Award, please supply as much information as you can to us so we can determine who the next recipient will be. The Banksite Service Award Committee will review each nomination and will select the chosen recipient the last Friday of the month. All nominations must be submitted no later than the Thursday before by 5 p.m.

Upon being selected as a Community Service Award recipient, Banksite will donate $1000 to the nonprofit organization of the recipient’s choice.

Submit a nomination today and say “thank you” to a special volunteer in our community.

content.name: area1
content.content:
Up-to-the-Minute, All-in-One-Place Mobile Banking

Banksite’s mobile app, Grip, is a smart and intuitive app for iOS and Android that makes it easy to manage your finances from all your financial institutions while on the go. Grip empowers you with balance inquiries, transaction listings, notifications of account limitations and branch/ATM location searches.

To use Grip you must be registered for Online Banking. Grip is free and available from the Apple iTunes Store and the Android Market.

Download Grip from iTunes

Download Grip from the Android Market

FAQ

What is this app? How does it work?

Grip is Banksite’s financial decision-support tool that allows you to aggregate all of your transactional data from multiple financial institutions into one up-to-the-minute view.

If I am not a technical person – will I be able to use this?

Although Grip has multiple layers that you can drill down into, it functions similarly to most apps on the market today. Our research shows that this is a very intuitive product that is both easy to learn and use.

What is the advantage to banking on my phone?

The advantage of viewing all of your financial account information with Grip is it enables you to make better decisions on the go and to see real-time, enriched transactions that help you understand your money flow and the impact that it has as you live your life... in the moment.

What type of phone do I need?

Grip supports devices with iOS 4.0 or above and Android 2.1 or above.

Can I use this app for business?

Grip allows you to tag purchases instantly. You can tag a purchase by job, type, or whatever category that works best with your business. You can also organize purchases with custom tags. You can create new tags on the go, or use the tags you’ve already created. You can even split purchases between tags, assigning multiple purchases to the same tag. Grip’s built in camera functionality also allows you to annotate your receipts and easily keep track of business expenses.

content.name: inArea5
content.content:
You've got questions; we've got answers

When it comes to running your business, we want to make sure things go smooth. That’s why we gathered all of our most frequently asked questions and put them into one central place. If your question is not answered below please contact us or fill out the form at the bottom of this page. We want to ensure that we make it as easy as possible for you to get the information you need as quickly as possible.

What is Remote Deposit?

Remote Deposit is a service which allows users to scan checks and transmit the scanned images and/or ACH-data to Banksite for posting and clearing. Checks you receive at your business can be scanned to create a digital deposit. This digital deposit is then transmitted (over an encrypted Internet connection) to Banksite. We accept the deposit and post it to your account. This feature is available for business accounts and can be accessed through Grip.

How did I dispute a transaction?

First try to resolve the problem with the merchant. If your attempts to settle the dispute with the merchant are unsuccessful, contact us for assistance. We will be able to provide you with the detailed information on what is required to dispute a charge.

Please note that you must notify us in writing within 60 days after receipt of the first bill on which the transaction appeared to preserve your rights under the law.

Where can I find Banksite ATMs?

All of Banksite ATM locations can be viewed here. If you use Grip, our free app for iOS and Android, you can quickly see free ATMs that are closest to your current GPS location.

Is there a daily limit on my BankSite business debit card?

Yes. For your protection, you can use your Banksite business debit card to make up to $7,000 in purchases a day. If you know you’ll exceed this amount, call us in advance at 1-877-884-3327 to set up a one-time, extended limit.

What is the difference between an Interest Checking Account and a Money Market Account?

Both accounts give you easy access to your money and a competitive interest rate on your balance. However, federal regulations limit the number of transactions you can make from a Money Market Account to six transactions per monthly statement period. Deposits are always unlimited and do not count towards your six transaction limit. With our Interest Checking Account, there is no limit on the number of transactions you can make and you can also use our online bill pay service for free. As your checking balance grows, you could earn a higher interest rate.

What information do I need to open a Banksite Business Checking Account?

You will need to have all of the below information whether you apply online, over the phone, or in person.

Business Information

  • Business name, address, phone number and fax number
  • Primary contact name, phone number and contact email address
  • Date established
  • Tax Identification Number
  • Type of industry
  • Ownership type
  • Number of owners and employees
  • Annual revenue

Owner/Principal Information

  • Name, home address, and date of birth
  • Citizenship
  • Social Security Number
  • Driver's License or ID Number: state issued, expiration data

content.name: inArea4
content.content:
You've got questions; we've got answers

When it comes to running your business, we want to make sure things go smooth. That’s why we gathered all of our most frequently asked questions and put them into one central place. If your question is not answered below please contact us or fill out the form at the bottom of this page. We want to ensure that we make it as easy as possible for you to get the information you need as quickly as possible.

What happens if the CD rate changes after I open a new account?

The Banksite Best Rate Guarantee lets you take advantage of some of the most competitive rates you’ll find. When you fund your new account within the first 10 days, you automatically get the best rate we offer during those 10 days, starting with your open date.

How do I receive my money when my CD matures?

At Banksite, we make it easy for you to receive your funds. Simply stop in at one of our branches or give us a call before your CD matures. If you do not notify us that you want to receive your funds, we will automatically renew your CD.

What is the difference between a money market account and a certificate of deposit?

A money market account is a savings or investment account that generally pays a higher rate than a conventional savings account. There’s no contract to keep funds on deposit for a specific period when you open a money market account, so there’s no penalties for withdrawals unless you exceed the transaction limits. Typically, CD rates will be a little higher than money market rates for the same dollar amounts, but the money market account gives you easier access to your money.

Is there a daily limit on my BankSite business debit card?

Yes. For your protection, you can use your Banksite business debit card to make up to $7,000 in purchases a day. If you know you’ll exceed this amount, call us in advance at 1-877-884-3327 to set up a one-time, extended limit.

A CD (short for Certificate of Deposit) is what we call a “time deposit.” This is a deposit that will be left with Banksite for an agreed-upon period of time, such as six months, a year, three years, etc. We are not required to allow withdrawals from the account before the end of the contract period.

What is the minimum deposit for a Banksite CD?

Banksite certificate of deposits start at $200.

content.name: area1
content.content:
The Environment

We are committed to addressing environmental sustainability at the grassroots level, as well as in our business practices as a company.

  • Energy - Investment in $6.3 million of business energy tax credits ranging from lighting efficiency projects to start-up costs for local farm biodiesel production.
  • LEED certification - Engaged in LEED certification process for three commercial lenders with intent to include more.
  • Paper waste reduction - Our statements are double-sided, saving 4 million pieces of paper each year.
  • Employee transit - 100% mass transit reimbursement for all employees living in areas where commuting by public transportation is an option.

Financial Fitness and Education

We aid small businesses and consumers on their path to financial fitness and prosperity by providing tools and workshops for financial literacy, SBA lending and home ownership.

Community Outreach

Through our volunteer programs, we bring assistance to youth development and education, the arts and community development. If you are interested in joining one of our service days, email serviceday@banksite.com or call 877-884-3327 for more information.

What is the difference between a money market account and a certificate of deposit?

content.name: area1
content.content:
Banksite was founded by a community of people who wanted to support each others’ financial needs. We’re proud of our journey over the years. Here’s a timeline of our roots as your premiere community bank.
  • 1964 – One branch, 6 employees and $40,000
  • 1984 – Bank headquarters move from the Cedar Falls Industrial Park to the historic downtown main street area. Grand opening reception included free pizza from Tony's Pizza.
  • 1994 – Wade Arnold takes over as President and CEO and launches new strategy and direction for the company. Assets total $80 million.
  • 1996 – Banksite purchases adjoining building and remodels their flagship store as a retail-oriented environment.
  • 2000 – Banksite acquires brokerage firm Tactical 8
  • 2002 – Next generation store opens in Waterloo's Downtown District. Store becomes a community center with regular events from movie night to yoga and investing basic.
  • 2006 – Launch of our Saturday Service days. Employees receive 40 annual hours of paid volunteer time to work with youth, education and community development organizations.
  • 2010 – Voted one of Iowa's Best Places to Work.
  • 2012 – Banksite aims to be a leader in offering new technology to their customers. They simultaneously launch a new website, a mobile app and the ability for customers to personalize their payment cards. All products gain a huge adoption rate and the Banksite website wins several national design awards.

If you receive this error message, please contact us or visit your location branch and we can order the checks for you.

content.name: area1
content.content:
Merchant Services for Quick and Simple Sales

Your concept has turned from “just an idea” to a full-fledged business and now you’ve got customers who are ready to buy. Close your sales quickly, simply and securely with Banksite merchant services. All of our merchant services can be tailored to fit your specific business needs.

Credit & Debit Card Processing

Give your customers even more payment choices by accepting credit cards and debit cards for Point-of-Sale purchases. Banksite, in partnership with Shazam, offers programs to fit the needs of your business. Contact one of our specialized business officers today to learn more about merchant credit card processing.

Customized Electronic Gift Cards

Encourage customers to shop at your business and increase revenue and customer loyalty. Gift cards can also help reduce the number of cash refunds you have to process.

Electronic Deposits

Express Deposit utilizes a desktop scanner that connects to your computer. Once connected to the Internet, you can scan checks received from customers and issue deposits electronically to the bank. Anytime, day or night. It’s the fastest way to turn check deposits into cash.

Learn more about Electronic deposits

Have questions? Contact a Banksite business representative today.

content.name: area1
content.content:
Find the investment products and services you need to pursue your financial goals. Banksite offers the convenience, choices and experience you need in today’s fast-pace financial marketplace.

Banksite Financial, a division of Banksite, is a Certified Financial Planning Group which provides full-service brokerage and financial planning service at Banksite. Base on your needs and expectations, our professional representatives are able to assist you in formulating an investment plan that will help you meet your financial goals. Whether you’re looking for single investment or a comprehensive plan from the complete range of investment options available, we’ll help you find exactly what you’re looking for.

Stop in to any Banksite location and take advantage of our investing knowledge and experience. Contact us today to schedule your free planning session.

Available Products & Services

  • Mutual funds
  • Tax Deferred Annuitites
  • Retirement Plans
  • Insured Municipal Bonds
  • Tax Advantage Investments
  • Common Stocks
  • Life Insurance

content.name: area1
content.content:
Perks from us, for your employees

You can’t always thank your employees for their dedication and hard work with more pay or a free business trip. Lucky for you, Banksite has plenty of perks to help your employees out.

Interest Checking

When you have a business checking or savings account with Banksite, your employees qualify for Interest Checking, a high interest personal account with no monthly service charge.

Easy Access to Payroll

Give your employees - even those who do not have a bank account - immediate access to their pay. With the Banksite Payroll Card, you can load their paycheck onto a personalized debit card.

Tax-Exempt Savings

Connect your employees, and their families, to tax-exempt savings for medical expenses through our Health Savings Accounts.

Continued Educations

With our free Business Education Courses, your employees can learn from the business experts at Banksite. A variety of courses are available. Contact us today for the latest schedule or to be notified of upcoming sessions.

content.name: area1
content.content:
If any of your Banksite credit or debit cards are lost or stolen, of if you think you have become a victim of identity theft, following these steps.
  • Call our 24-hour assistance at 1-877-884-3327
  • Contact all card companies right away to report stolen cards
  • Call one of the consumer credit reporting agencies to place a fraud alert on your credit report. You only need to contact one of the three companies to place an alert. The company you contact is required to contact the other two, which will place an alert on their versions of your report, too.
    • Equifax - 1-800-555-6767
    • Experian - 1-800-555-9456
    • Trans Union - 1-888-555-0021
  • Report the theft to the Federal Trade Commission at 1-800-555-7321

content.name: area1
content.content:
Online Banking

The best part about Banksite’s online banking is that it uses the same platform as our mobile app. Everything you do in Grip will automatically transfer to your Online Banking - and vice versa. Whether you access your accounts via Grip while on the go, or you log in to Online Banking from you home computer, all your data stays synchronized. Enjoy the convenience and security of Banksite’s intuitive online banking for business.

Features

  • 24/7 access to your account balances and history

  • View check and deposit images
  • View and download your bank statements
  • Setup email, text or phone call alerts
  • Pay bills

Enroll Now Demo

Bill Pay

Paying your bills is easy with Banksite’s free online bill pay. Pay any vendor you normally pay by check with a few simple clicks - it’s safe, secure and convenient.

Features

  • View, schedule and pay bills
  • Pay anyone
  • Schedule payments in advance
  • Setup recurring payments for any of your monthly bills
  • Receive payment confirmation numbers with every scheduled payment
  • Register for eBills so you can view bills electronically through Bill Pay

You must enroll for Online Banking in order to use bill pay.

The best part about Banksite’s online banking is that it uses the same platform as our mobile app. Everything you do in Grip will automatically transfer to your Online Banking - and vice versa. Whether you access your accounts via Grip while on the go, or you log in to Online Banking from you home computer, all your data stays synchronized. Enjoy the convenience and security of Banksite’s intuitive online banking.

Features

  • 24/7 access to your account balances and history

content.name: area1
content.content:
Up-to-the-Minute, All-in-One-Place Mobile Banking

Banksite’s mobile app, Grip, is a smart and intuitive app for iOS and Android that makes it easy to manage your finances from all your financial institutions while on the go. Grip empowers you with balance inquiries, transaction listings, notifications of account limitations and branch/ATM location searches.

To use Grip you must be registered for Online Banking. Grip is free and available from the Apple iTunes Store and the Android Market.

Download Grip from iTunes

Download Grip from the Android Market

FAQ

What is this app? How does it work?

Grip is Banksite’s financial decision-support tool that allows you to aggregate all of your transactional data from multiple financial institutions into one up-to-the-minute view.

If I am not a technical person – will I be able to use this?

Although Grip has multiple layers that you can drill down into, it functions similarly to most apps on the market today. Our research shows that this is a very intuitive product that is both easy to learn and use.

What is the advantage to banking on my phone?

The advantage of viewing all of your financial account information with Grip is it enables you to make better decisions on the go and to see real-time, enriched transactions that help you understand your money flow and the impact that it has as you live your life... in the moment.

What type of phone do I need?

Grip supports devices with iOS 4.0 or above and Android 2.1 or above.

Can I use this app for business?

Grip allows you to tag purchases instantly. You can tag a purchase by job, type, or whatever category that works best with your business. You can also organize purchases with custom tags. You can create new tags on the go, or use the tags you’ve already created. You can even split purchases between tags, assigning multiple purchases to the same tag. Grip’s built in camera functionality also allows you to annotate your receipts and easily keep track of business expenses.

content.name: area1
content.content:
One our primary objectives at Banksite it to help our local business community grow. We will work with you to help you reach your business goals. You can count on straightforward loans and financing options that meet your business needs and are backed by local decision making and personalized service.

Features

  • Local decision making
  • Easy application process (apply now)
  • Flexible options
  • Competitive rates
  • Fast approval
  • Personalized attention from start to finish

We offer the following business loans and financing options:

Commercial Real Estate Loans

Whether buying a building or refinancing to make improvements, Banksite will work directly with you to make this transition go smooth.

Construction Loans

Do you need to expand your growing business? If you're adding or building a new facility, we offer a variety of financing terms to fit your cash flow.

Term Loans

If it’s a loan to purchase equipment or a new business vehicle, we offer a range of maturities with fixed rates to help you purchase the tools to grow your business.

Working Capital Loans

Is your business growing and you need additional capital? This is a convenient way to make sure your business is always ready for those seasonal, cyclical or growth needs.

Letters of Credit

We can help you extend the scope of your business with a letter of credit to provide the financial strength to open the doors of international and domestic opportunities with suppliers and customers.

Small Business Administration (SBA) Loans

The SBA has developed specific programs to help small business obtain financing. We can help you throughout the 7(a), SBA Express or 504 application process. See the SBA Lending page for more information.

Agricultural Loans

Banksite’s ag lenders are experienced in the specialized credit needs of ag customers, including farm operation, livestock, machinery purchases and farm real estate.

Contact one of our experienced commercial lenders today to discuss your business' specific financial needs.

All loans subject to credit approval.

content.name: area1
content.content:
Your small business saves time and money when you choose Banksite’s Visa® Business Debit Card. It offers quick and easy purchasing everywhere that Visa credit cards are accepted. Save on business products and services at select merchants with Visa discounts for business cardholders.

Features

  • Withdraw or deposit funds at any ATM where you see the SHAZAM® or Cirrus symbols
  • Check account balances
  • Access your accounts 24/7
  • Pay no surcharge fee when using a Banksite ATM at one of over 3,500 SHAZAM Privileged Status ATMs
  • Make up to 15 withdrawals in a month at any non-Banksite-owned ATM for free
  • Make Visa purchases at any merchant displaying the Visa symbol
  • Make purchases as debit or credit
  • Unlike credit cards, when swiped as debit, transactions are automatically deducted from your checking account.
  • Every transaction is recorded on your monthly statement and can be viewed immediately via online banking.

Debit Card Details

The Visa® logo on your debit card allows you to do much more than just obtain cash and perform other banking functions at ATMs. You can also make purchases at any of the millions of merchants worldwide who accept Visa®. Purchase amounts, just like ATM cash withdrawals, are automatically deducted from your checking account and they show on your monthly statement. You can also get cash back on your purchases when your card is swiped using the “Debit” key at the checkout - a small convenience that can be a big help when you need some extra cash.

Personalize Your Debit Card

Brand your Banksite debit card by customizing it with your business logo. Or choose to support the University of Northern Iowa by signing up for one of our Panther Pride branded cards. Learn more and design your card today.

Lost or Stolen Card

If your business debit card is lost or stolen during normal business hours, please contact your local Banksite branch immediately. For 24-hour assistance, seven days a week, call SHAZAM’s 24-hour help desk at 877-884-3327.

content.name: area1
content.content:
• The Sign Zone

    The Sign Zone is a locally owned decal and design shop specializing in signs, banners and car decals. Sign Zone supports many other local businesses by providing affordable advertising and business solutions including commercial vehicle decals, storefront lettering and point-of-purchase displays. The Sign Zone has partnered with Banksite since their inception in 2002.

  • Jill's Java House

    A local favorite for all Banksite employees, Jill’s Java House has three locations throughout the metro area. Serving all of your favorite coffee drinks, smoothies, desserts and sandwiches, Jill Smith opened her first coffee house back in 2008. Since then, business has boomed and she will add a fourth location to her roster in the fall of 2012. Jill’s Java House is open daily from 5 a.m. until 10 p.m.

  • Tony's Pizza

    Tony’s Pizza was founded in 1984 by Tony and Maria Tambino. Tony and Maria have four children: Danny, Peter, Liz and Ben. They started out with 3 employees. Today, there are 25 part-time employees, many of which are local high school students. Tony’s Pizza serves pizza, pasta, sandwiches, dessert, salads and soups. Among several small town differences, Tony’s grates all of their own cheese - approximately 500 lbs. per week! They also make fresh dough at least four times per day, using 25 lbs. of flour each time. There’s no shortage of goodness in Tony’s Pizza!

content.name: area1
content.content:
You've got questions; we've got answers

When it comes to money, things can get confusing. That’s why we gathered all of our most frequently asked questions and put them into one central place. If your question is not answered below please contact us or fill out the form at the bottom of this page. We want to ensure that we make it as easy as possible for you to get the information you need as quickly as possible.

What is APY?

Annual Percentage Yield - APY

The APY is similar in nature to the annual percentage rate. Its usefulness lies in its ability to standardize varying interest-rate agreements into an annualized percentage number.

For example, suppose you are considering whether to invest in a one-year zero-coupon bond that pays 6% upon maturity or a high-yield money market account that pays 0.5% per month with monthly compounding.

At first glance, the yields appear equal because 12 months multiplied by 0.5% equals 6%. However, when the effects of compounding are included by calculating the APY, we find that the second investment actually yields 6.17%, as 1.005^12-1 = 0.0617.

How did I dispute a transaction?

First try to resolve the problem with the merchant. If your attempts to settle the dispute with the merchant are unsuccessful, contact us for assistance. We will be able to provide you with the detailed information on what is required to dispute a charge.

Please note that you must notify us in writing within 60 days after receipt of the first bill on which the transaction appeared to preserve your rights under the law.

Where can I find Banksite ATMs?

All of Banksite ATM locations can be viewed here. If you use Grip, our free app for iOS and Android, you can quickly see free ATMs that are closest to your current GPS location.

Is there a daily limit on my BankSite debit card?

Yes. For your protection, you can use your Banksite debit card to make up to $3,000 in purchases a day. If you know you’ll exceed this amount, call us in advance at 1-877-884-3327 to set up a one-time, extended limit.

What is the difference between an Interest Checking Account and a Money Market Account?

Both accounts give you easy access to your money and a competitive interest rate on your balance. However, federal regulations limit the number of transactions you can make from a Money Market Account to six transactions per monthly statement period. Deposits are always unlimited and do not count towards your six transaction limit. With our Interest Checking Account, there is no limit on the number of transactions you can make and you can also use our online bill pay service for free. As your checking balance grows, you could earn a higher interest rate.

What information do I need to open a Banksite Interest Checking Account?

Your name, contact information and social security number are the only things we need. If opening a joint account, we will need this information for each account owner. If you already have an account with us, we will authenticate your identity and pre-fill most of the application for you.

content.name: area1
content.content:
Banksite is constantly working to protect you from fraud and identity theft. In addition all of our system securities, the best thing you can do is to gain awareness and learn more.

Have you received a suspicious looking email or other piece of communication? Call us right away at 877-884-3327 to confirm if it was something we sent you.

Learn

Familiarize yourself with basic information about fraud and identity theft at one of our free Lunch & Learn Events. Check the schedule of events or email lunchlearn@banksite.com to be added to the email list and receive notifications of future events.

Prevent

While many people are subjected to fraud and identity theft, there are a number of things you can do to minimize your risk.

  • Do not open or respond to online solicitations for personal information. Banksite will never send email containing attachments, or require you to send personal information via email.
  • When a Social Security number is requested to sign up for a service, confirm that it is actually needed rather than some of form of identification.
  • Utilize paperless options and limit your receipt of paper statements.
  • Use Bill Pay so you can pay all your bills online. The fewer personal documents sent through the mail, the less chance there is for fraud.

Act

Report lost or stolen cards immediately. Follow these simple steps.

When you need extra cash, but not all at once, a home equity line of credit may be the answer. You could use these easy-to-access funds for home improvements, education expenses, debt consolidation and more. Interest may be deductible. Consult your tax advisor to determine the deductibility of your interest.

content.name: area1
content.content:
Express Deposit utilizes a desktop scanner that connects to your computer. Once connected to the Internet, you can scan checks received from customers and issue deposits electronically to the bank. Anytime, day or night. It’s the fastest, and most secure way to turn check deposits into cash. Get more information by contacting Banksite today.

Features

  • Consolidate funds from remote locations into one bank
  • Make dposits anytime, day or night
  • Save time preparing deposits
  • Cut costly courier fees or trips to a branch
  • Reduce risk of check fraud

How does Express Deposit work?

Step 1: Scan checks from the Banksite desktop scanner provided to you

  • Scan both sides of the checks in a single pass

Step 2: Prepare the deposit

  • View images of scanned checks from the Banksite Express Deposit Software - dollar amounts will automatically be read and totaled

Step 3: Electronically send deposits to Banksite

  • Funds will be deposited to your account the same business day if deposited before 6:00 p.m.

Ready to get your business set up with Express Deposit? Contact Banksite today for your initial set-up consultation.

content.name: area1
content.content:
As a Preferred Lender with the U.S. Small Business Administration, Banksite can approve certain loans that might not qualify through conventional lending channels.

Banksite actively participates in the SBA Express Program which reduces application forms and streamlines the process for faster turnaround.

Features

  • More convenient loan terms and rates
  • Longer terms structured to improve cash flow
  • Lower your rate by 1.5% when you have qualifying relationship with Banksite
  • Quick and streamlined application process (apply now)
  • Fast approval
  • Personalized attention from start to finish

SBA Loan Programs

There are three basic types of SBA Loan Programs and several special-purpose categories of Section 7(a) loans, including:

  • The Basic Section 7(a) Loan Guaranty Program
  • The Section 504 Certified Development Company Program
  • The microLoan, a section of 7(m) Loan Program

To learn more and discover which program is best for your business, contact one of our SBA Lending agents today. We will explain all of your options and walk by your side every step of the way.

content.name: inArea1
content.content:
Home Loans

Buying a home is a big deal, whether it’s your first time or your fifth. You need experience from professionals who understand that finding the right mortgage is just as important as finding the right house. Banksite’s loan officers will take the time to listen, helping you select the home loan and terms that best fit your lifestyle and budget. You can apply online and when you come into one of our branches we’ll have everything ready so your application is processed as quickly and easily as possible.

Features

  • Local decision making
  • Personalized service from start to finish
  • Easy and convenient online loan application (apply now)
  • Lowest rates available
  • Pre-qualified mortgage available
  • Quick, smooth closing process

Pre-qualified mortgage

Banksite can help you get pre-qualified, saving time and stress by determining how much you can afford before you start looking for your next home. You’ll also increase your bargaining and negotiating power, as sellers will be more likely to accept your offer knowing you are pre-qualified.

Whether you’re buying a home, building a new one, or even refinancing, contact one of our experienced loan officers today.

content.name: area1
content.content:
Having a plan in place for those times when your balance runs low is a good idea. To help you avoid overdraft fees and declined transactions, we offer Standard Overdraft Protection on all Banksite checking accounts.

Standard Overdraft Protection links your savings account with your checking account to cover overdrafts if and when they occur. Money is transferred in increments of $25 as long as your savings balance can cover the payment.

What does it cost?

You will be charged a $10 fee each time you use your debit card and do not have sufficient funds in the account. Banksite charges a maximum of five fees per day and we will not charge fees on items under $10.

How can I avoid paying overdraft fees?

The easiest way to avoid overdraft fees is to sign up for Online Banking or Mobile Banking. With our free Mobile Banking app, you have 24 hour access to your account information and can stay informed with customized alerts which inform you when your account balances are low.

More details about Banksite's Overdraft Protection

The overdraft fee(s) may be imposed for covering overdrafts created by check, in-person withdrawal, debit card transactions or other electronic means. Once an overdraft has occurred, you are obligated to bring your account to a positive balance. Whether your overdraft is paid is at the discretion of Banksite and we reserve the right not to pay a transaction. For example, we typically do not pay overdrafts if your account is not in good standing or you are not making regular deposits.

content.name: area1
content.content:
Experience the ultimate in financial convenience with Banksite’s Visa® Debit Card. Get cash, check account balances or transfer funds at any ATM nationwide displaying the SHAZAM® or Cirrus symbols. When you use your Vista Debit Card, funds are withdrawn directly from your checking account and recorded on your statement.

Features

  • Withdraw or deposit funds at any ATM where you see the SHAZAM® or Cirrus symbols
  • Check account balances
  • Access your accounts 24/7
  • Pay no surcharge fee when using a Banksite ATM at one of over 3,500 SHAZAM Privileged Status ATMs
  • Make up to 15 withdrawals in a month at any non-Banksite-owned ATM for free
  • Make Visa purchases at any merchant displaying the Visa symbol
  • Make purchases as debit or credit
  • Unlike credit cards, when swiped as debit, transactions are automatically deducted from your checking account.
  • Every transaction is recorded on your monthly statement and can be viewed immediately via online banking.

Debit Card Details

The Visa® logo on your debit card allows you to do much more than just obtain cash and perform other banking functions at ATMs. You can also make purchases at any of the millions of merchants worldwide who accept Visa®. Purchase amounts, just like ATM cash withdrawals, are automatically deducted from your checking account and they show on your monthly statement. You can also get cash back on your purchases when your card is swiped using the “Debit” key at the checkout - a small convenience that can be a big help when you need some extra cash.

Personalize Your Debit Card

Make your Banksite debit card your very own by customizing it with your favorite photo! Or, support the University of Northern Iowa by signing up for one of our Panther Pride branded cards. Learn more and design your card today.

Lost or Stolen Card

If your debit card is lost or stolen during normal business hours, please contact your local Banksite branch immediately. For 24-hour assistance, seven days a week, call SHAZAM’s 24-hour help desk at 877-884-3327.
